entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late in the afternoon.
